item.name: Oxen
item.desc: These mighty oxen, covered in diamonds and gold, were once used by the mighty Egyptian emporers to move their goods around.

item.name: Food
item.desc: Feast on the food of the old Greek gods and enjoy their wine.

item.name: Clothing
item.desc: Travel the Oregon Trail in style with the latest designer clothing.

item.name: Pimp Cane
item.desc: Impress all of the people you meet during your travels with this awesome pimp cane.

item.name: Pimp Wagon
item.desc: Travel in style! Brand new steam powered hydralics, wood finished spinners, large 50" HD paintings of forests, and two decked out oxen covered in diamonds and fitted with NOS for that extra ox power. Goes well with Pimp Cane.

item.name: Wheel
item.desc: Wheel for the wagon. Comes with spinners

item.name: Axle
item.desc: Axle for the wagon. All ready for assembly with hydralics.

item.name: Hello Kitty! fortress
item.desc: Fortify your wagon with this awesome Hello Kitty! fortress modification. Your wagon will be impenetrable from the outside. Comes with Hello Kitty! swords, shields, and bows and arrows.

item.name: Hello Kitty! Notebook
item.desc: Keep track of your daily travels in this super awesome Hello Kitty! notebook. Comes in pink, pink, and pink.
